detail_desc: Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket and flap front pockets. Lined.

Longer, quilted nylon down jacket with a detachable faux fur-lined hood. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, flap patch front pockets and vents with press-studs at the sides. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Set with earrings and ear cuffs in metal decorated with plastic beads and glass rhinestones. Six earrings in various designs and four ear cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, wrapover front with a decorative frill trim, and a small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie-belt at the waist and wide, full-length legs. Jersey lining at the top. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with a button fly. The jeans are made from thermal Thermolite® fabric.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, one button at the front, long sleeves and high slits in the sides.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Top in an airy cotton weave with flounces at the top, narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and elastication at the top of the back.
Gently fitted jacket in soft faux fur with a lined hood, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, textured-knit wool blend with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut, wide blouse in satin with a sheen. Boat neck, dropped shoulders and long, drawstring sleeves.

Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly with decorative buttons, and patch front pockets. Tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains, two of which have pendants. Adjustable length 41.5-50 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with an elasticated waist, pleats and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length treggings in sturdy jersey with fine details. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Padded gilet in a wool blend with a brushed finish. Stand-up collar, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and side pockets with a concealed press-stud. Lined.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, lacing at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Side support and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and button, side pockets at the front, back pockets and straight legs.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Jacquard-weave top with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a smocked seam under the bust. Short puff sleeves with gathers and concealed elastication for a draped effect. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with flounced cap sleeves and buttons down the back.
Shirt in checked cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, two chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.

Lace push-up body with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, and a string at the back. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a gathered V-neck, pleat at the front, slit at the cuffs, and rounded hem.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and lace-trimmed hems with short slits in the sides.

Long T-shirt in slub cotton jersey in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Round neckline with a raw, roll edge, a chest pocket and a rounded hem at the front. Longer at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour waist panel.
Cold shoulder dress in patterned jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Triangle bikini top with lined cups, ties at the back and double ties at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a round neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.

Short, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Narrow cut at the top with a narrow, smocked trim around the neckline, and an elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft, striped cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short slits in the sides.
Fisherman’s hat in a cotton weave. Lined.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, pleats at the front and a V-shaped opening at the back with wide ties at the back of the neck. Unlined.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar with a piped trim and French front. Yoke and darts at the back, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Fitted top in softly draping, fine-ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with extra-long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length, fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Treggings in stretch imitation leather with an elasticated waist and seams on the legs. Soft inside.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length dress in soft, jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck, concealed, gathered elastication front and back for a draped effect, and short dolman sleeves with wide hems. Lined.
Shorts in an airy weave. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and buttons, and flap leg pockets.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, chest pocket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Shorts in patterned, washed superstretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Mesh bustier with embroidered appliqués and underwired cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps, softer front panels for additional support, a zip in the side and an elasticated hem. Mesh-lined front.
V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a lace trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps.
Hi-tops in patterned imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Double-breasted jacket in bouclé made from a cotton blend with notch lapels, flap front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Pool shoes in scuba fabric with a hook and loop fastening at the top (sizes 7-9 also with a heel strap). Fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Henley top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with worn details and a smart stretch function so that the shorts embrace the body for a comfortable and flattering fit. High waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Ankle-length dress in satin with ties at the back of the neck and a concealed zip in one side. V-neck and a wrapover front with gathers at one side to create a gentle draping effect. Unlined.
Clutch bag with a flap that has a decorative, round metal buckle and magnetic fastener. Narrow metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Recycled polyester lining.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a knit containing some wool with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Balconette bra in lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that lift and shape, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Court shoes in soft suede with chisel toes and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapering legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Dress in airy, softly draping satin with lace details and hole embroidery. Lace-covered V-neck front and back, and cap sleeves. The dress is in a straight cut with gentle draping to the hem and has an asymmetric hem with a slit at the front. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch checked weave with narrow notch lapels. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with ribbing at the top, a wide V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide, covered elastication at the back, pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and wide legs.
